requests.form_embedding_desc: Paste the following form in to your existing website

task_retry.title: Task Retry Settings
task_retry.desc: Occasionally, requests may fail to automatically extract data from your assets. You may choose who to notify when these errors occur.

rules.title: Rules
rules.reject_unverified_requests: Reject requests that have not been verified
rules.reject_request_limits_quantity_error: Completed requests must be greater than 0
rules.reject_request_limits_months_error: Month interval must be greater than 0
rules.automatically_fulfill_requests_after_sub: Automatically fulfill requests after subtasks are complete

form.organization_desc: Enter details about your organization below so that we can customize your experience and communication.

roles.select_a_role: Select a role to modify it's permissions.

systems.mapping_desc: View asset mapping to data subjects so assets can be populated in requests.
systems.require_asset_approval: Require Approval when adding Asset records
systems.require_processing_activity_approval: Require Approval when adding Processing Activity records
systems.require_processing_activity_approval_ser: Require Approval when adding Service records

communication.subject: Email Subject Line

substitutions.%request_type%: Input the Request Type (Download, Delete, etc.)
substitutions.%company_name%: Input your Company's Name (Configured in Details)
substitutions.%download_link%: Input a button to download the data associated with the Request.
substitutions.%company_phone%: Input your Company's Phone Number (Configured in Details)
substitutions.%button_link%: Input a button with custom text that links to any URL.
substitutions.%url_link%: Input a hyperlink with custom text that links to any URL.
substitutions.%verify_link%: Input a button for the user to click to verify their e-mail.

communication.email_templates_desc: Create or edit email templates so your organizations communication can be consistent and personalized.
communication.notification_settings_desc: Choose which notifications you would like your organization to receive based on events that occur in the Opsware system.

notifications.new_request_desc: Send email when new request is received
notifications.new_asset_discovered_desc: Send an email when a new asset is discovered
notifications.request_review_desc: Send an email to Asset / Processing Activity owners when a review is requested
notifications.review_complete_desc: Send an email to the user who requested a review of an Asset / Processing Activity when the review is complete
notifications.request_approval_desc: Send an email to users who can approve Assets / Processing Activities when they are marked Ready for Approval
notifications.assign_owner_desc: Send an email to users when they are assigned as an owner to Assets / Processing Activities
notifications.acknowledgement_email: Send an acknowledgement as part of the Requests workflow

communication.email_customization_desc: Customize the look and feel of Opsware's default email template.
communication.save_or_undo_tooltip: Please save or undo your changes to the email content below
communication.custom_logo_info_1: SVG Support based on Email Support, PNG recommended.

permissions.requests-notifications-create_text: Send email when request is received
permissions.requests-list-data-extract_text: Display Requests in Data Extract Status
permissions.requests-list-data-execute_text: Display Requests in Data Execution Status
permissions.systems-list-others_subtext: Toggling off will mean users can not view details of assets they are not assigned to
permissions.systems-edit-others_subtext: Toggling off will mean a user can only edit assets assigned to them
permissions.processing_activities-list-others_subtex: Toggling off will mean users can not view details of processing activities they are not assigned to
permissions.processing_activities-edit-others_subtex: Toggling off will mean a user can only edit Processing Activities assigned to them.
permissions.processing_activities-edit-data_retentio: Edit Data Retention and Disposal Policy

oauth_settings.title: OAuth Settings
oauth_settings.enable_subtext: Allow your staff and applications to authenticate with Opsware via OAuth2
oauth_settings.no_clients: You don't have any OAuth clients yet.

fields.name: Name
fields.client_secret_warning: This is the only time you will see this secret. Please copy this secret to a secure location for later use.

security.password_reuse_not_allowed: Users are not allowed to reuse

two_f_auth.title: Two-Factor Authentication
two_f_auth.enable_subtext: MFA should be required on login, and the user should be required to set up MFA if they haven't already
